translations.chinese: 留蕭何收巴蜀租，給軍食。
translations.english: He left Xiao He to collect taxes from Ba and Shu to supply the army's provisions.

translations.chinese: 五月，漢王引兵從故道出襲雍。
translations.english: In the fifth month, King Han led troops from the old road to attack Yong by surprise.

translations.chinese: 雍王邯迎擊漢陳倉，雍兵敗，還走；
translations.english: King Yong Zhang Han met and attacked the Han army at Chencang. The Yong troops were defeated and fled back;
they fought at Haozhi and suffered another great defeat, fleeing to Feiqiu.
King Han then pacified Yong territory.
